Plot: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.
Title: Body of Lies
Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Russell Crowe, Mark Strong, Golshifteh Farahani
tomatoConsensus: Body of Lies relies on the performances of Russell Crowe and Leonardo DiCaprio to elevate it beyond the conventional espionage thriller.
